venue.address_2: Across the street from Roxbury CC & MBTA
venue.name: Reggie Lewis Track and Athletic Center (RLTAC) at Roxbury Community College

item.description:
16th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival

10:00 AM - 6:00 PM  Oct 29-30, 2011 Save the dates!

10:00 AM - 6:00 PM  October 29, 2011

  • 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM - Prepaid Preview (Pay BVS $5 online)
  • 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM  October 29, 2011 - FREE (Saturday)
  • 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM  October 30, 2011 - FREE (Sunday)

The 16th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival will be back at the Reggie Lewis Athletic Center with a fabulous lineup of national speakers and chefs, tasty free food sampling, and over 100 exhibitors, all illustrating how plant-based living is fun and easy as well as enjoyable and very rewarding.  You won't want to miss it!   www.bostonveg.org/foodfest
